Mahadum Yale bụ mahadum nyocha Ivy League nke onwe ya na New Haven, Connecticut
E hiwere ya na 1701 dị ka Collegiate School, ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nke atọ kachasị ochie nke agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na United States na n'etiti ndị kachasị ewu ewu n'ụwa.
A haziri Yale n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ mejupụtara iri na anọ: kọleji mbụ na-agụghị akwụkwọ, Yale Graduate School of Arts and Sciences na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkachamara iri na abụọ
Ọ bụ ezie na mahadum Yale Corporation na-achịkwa mahadum, ngalaba ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ bụla na-ahụ maka usoro ọmụmụ na mmemme nzere ya

Na mgbakwunye na ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti dị na ogbe ndịda New Haven, mahadum ahụ nwere akụrụngwa egwuregwu na ọdịda anyanwụ New Haven, ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na West Haven, yana oke ọhịa na ihe okike na-echekwa New England niile

Dị ka nke 2021, a na-eji onyinye mahadum ahụ kpọrọ ihe na ijeri $ 42.3, nke abụọ kachasị na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ọ bụla.  Ọbá akwụkwọ mahadum Yale, na-eje ozi ụlọ akwụkwọ niile mejupụtara, nwere ihe karịrị nde 15 ma bụrụ ọba akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ nke atọ kachasị na United States.  Ụmụ akwụkwọ na-asọ mpi n'egwuregwu intercollegiate dị ka Yale Bulldogs na NCAA Division I - Ivy League..
